body_html:
Your script works for me on a recent TF nightly:

batch 0
  minibatch loss: 2.396763324737549
batch 100
  minibatch loss: 1.7288659811019897
batch 200
  minibatch loss: 1.5466532707214355

I probably fixed the shape propagation issues some time ago. Try it again with the recent version of TF. Reopen this bug if it's still an issue for you.

body:
Your script works for me on a recent TF nightly:

```
batch 0
  minibatch loss: 2.396763324737549
batch 100
  minibatch loss: 1.7288659811019897
batch 200
  minibatch loss: 1.5466532707214355
```

I probably fixed the shape propagation issues some time ago.  Try it again with the recent version of TF.  Reopen this bug if it's still an issue for you.
